note.title: Former Wizard-Based Workflow
note.para: The installation medium of &sles4sap; contains a preconfigured &ay; XML file and a DUD file, in the directory sap-apl. This &ay; XML file is set up to work like the former Wizard-Based Workflow of &sles4sapa; 12 and can be used where compatibility with the old installer is necessary.
Note that installing using these files is not supported. The preferred way of installing is to use the installation workflow, as described in .
